name: Pixel Up!
description:
This game is made for the DevIndo Game Jam 2 with the theme Pixels. 

Welcome to the world of Pixel. You have two options: go to the world of platformer or paint and make money. You can collect pixels through adventuring the platformer world, obtaining pixels around while avoiding death, or you can create art from commissions and create them art.

The game currently only has 4 platformer levels with each platformer level contain one order request. Although this game jam lasts one month, there were times I couldn't work on it thanks to college. Hope you guys enjoy the game.

This game is fully developed by TheGamer.

Fonts used: Humble Fonts - Gold (https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold)
